original_text: The leaders of the families in Gilead's clan went to Moses and to the other leaders of the Israelites' clans. (Gilead was the descendant of Makir, who was the descendant of Manasseh. Manasseh was Joseph's son.)
korean_text: 요셉 자손의 종족 중 므낫세의 손자 마길의 아들 길르앗 자손 종족들의 수령들이 나아와 모세와 이스라엘 자손의 수령 된 지휘관들 앞에 말하여

sentences.original_text: The leaders of the families in Gilead's clan
and to the other leaders of the Israelites' clans
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 씨족의 다른 지도자들에게 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: Gilead was the descendant of Makir
who was the descendant of Manasseh
